content: अतिवर्धनं Excessive growth, increase, adding to, increasing; एतत्खलु व्यजनानिलैरति(भि)वर्धनं प्रभं जनस्य यदस्मद्विधैः परिबोधनमार्यस्य <ls>K. 289</ls>; <ab>cf.</ab> “Carrying coals to New-castle”, or “To gild refined gold, to paint the lily, … or with taper-light the eye of Heaven to garnish is wasteful and ridiculous excess”; See the other phrases on the same page.
